articles.author: Michael Jones
articles.title: England vs India LIVE: Cricket result as England seal record win
articles.description: Follow latest reaction after England sealed a record win on the final day of the fifth Test at Edgbaston
articles.content:
Post-match reaction from Englands Joe Root
Joe Root had a chat with Ian Ward and Nasser Hussain after sowing up the fifth test for England in a record run chase.
It was pretty fun doing it. he said… [+833 chars]

articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.title: Shane Warne memorial - watch & follow updates
articles.description: Watch live coverage and follow text updates and tributes from the state memorial for Australian cricket legend Shane Warne at the Melbourne Cricket Ground.
articles.content: Former England bowler and BBC cricket presenter Isa Guha, who became a colleague of Warne's in the commentary box: "It has been a strange few weeks - a lot of shock and then we did our own tribute at… [+396 chars]

articles.title: PCB hands Umar Akmal three-year ban from all cricket | ESPNcricinfo.com

articles.content: Umar Akmal's troubled cricket career has hit its biggest roadblock yet, with the PCB handing him a ban from all representative cricket for three years after he pleaded guilty of failing to report det… [+1506 chars]

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
